actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the full exclusion applicable to qualified small business stock.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the 100% exclusion from gross income of gain from the sale or exchange of qualified small business stock held for more than 5 years.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the full exclusion applicable to qualified small business stock.
